t=int(raw_input())
while(t>0):
    c=0
    n=int(raw_input())
    p=map(int,raw_input().split())
    r=map(int,raw_input().split())
    p.sort()
    r.sort()
    for i in p:
        f=i
        for j in r:
            if(f<=j):
                c=c+1
                r.remove(j)
                break
            
    print c
    
    t=t-1
